company.name: SnagFixr
company.overview: SnagFixr is a professional execution service built to solve friction that stalls scaling startups. It specializes in resolving bottlenecks in operations, sourcing, production, usability, and GTM (go-to-market) flows. Unlike typical consultants or agencies, SnagFixr plugs directly into a team, quietly fixes what’s stuck, and leaves behind scalable systems.

services.fix_sprints: Short-term, scoped projects (2–6 weeks) designed to address a defined problem fast.
services.retainers: Embedded for 1–3 months, offering deep operational or vendor/supply-chain support.

solutions: GTM process cleanup, funnel gap detection
use_cases: VC-backed startups stuck between prototype and launch
D2C brands needing to localize China-dependent sourcing
Founders too stretched to untangle vendor/ops mess
SaaS teams needing UX and workflow audits
Internal teams too close to see what’s broken
company.sample_case_study: A VC-funded D2C startup had delayed its first 1,000-unit production run due to misaligned vendor specs, missing QC protocols, and no pilot testing system. SnagFixr dropped in, restructured vendor SLAs, set up first-article inspections, onboarded a new backup factory, and launched the pilot in 11 days. The fix cut launch delay by 45 days and prevented ₹32L in RTO/rework losses.

founder.name: Hitesh Bhagat
founder.title: Founder
founder.bio: Hitesh is a one-man execution unit for D2C, SaaS, IoT, and hardware startups. He steps in when founders hit a 'stall point' — such as a delayed product launch, broken ops chain, or usability dead zone — and quietly fixes it.
capabilities: Creating systems that outlast the engagement
highlights: Built world’s largest hydroponic system in Angola
Built India’s first extrusion-based soundbar body supply chain
Drove 650% e-com growth for a D2C brand in 6 months
